au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.name: L1=20m_L2=2p5m_offset_apx2p5
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) #sics.drive('nvs_lambda', 5.0) # Drive detector to short position sics.set('/instrument/detector/detector_y/speed', 53) driveDet(1700,300) # Drive guide to ga driveGuide(guideConfig.ga) # Drive entrance aperture to 150 (no guides) driveEntRotAp(150) #set sample ap to 2.5 mm sics.drive('apx', 0) # Drive beamstops up selBs(1) # set beamcentres sics.set('beamcenterx', 38.26) sics.set('beamcenterz', 96.08)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(29, 100) # Drive attenuator to 300 driveAtt(210)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(210) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(29, 0) driveBsz(262)
